articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: Twitch loosens its policy on sexual content - The Verge
articles.description: Twitch is changing its rules on sexual content and will now allow certain kinds of streams as long as they’re properly labeled.
articles.content:
Twitch loosens its policy on sexual content
Twitch loosens its policy on sexual content
 / Twitchs new policy means artists should be able to safely draw nude characters. 
ByEmma Roth, a news writ… [+3088 chars]
